head: nutella cookies
tail: preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) and line a baking sheet with parchment paper

head: nutella cookies
tail: combine 2 ½ cups all-purpose flour, ¼ cup unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 teaspoon baking soda, and 1 teaspoon salt

head: nutella cookies
tail: beat 1 cup room temperature butter, ¾ cup brown sugar, and ¾ cup white sugar until smooth

head: nutella cookies
tail: beat in 2 large eggs one at a time, then mix in 2 tablespoons vanilla extract and ½ cup chocolate-hazelnut spread (such as Nutella)

head: nutella cookies
tail: slowly add the flour mixture to the wet ingredients and stir just until combined

head: nutella cookies
tail: fold in ½ cup chopped toasted hazelnuts and 1 cup chocolate chips

head: nutella cookies
tail: drop the dough onto the prepared baking sheet by tablespoons or with a cookie scoop

head: nutella cookies
tail: bake for 10 to 12 minutes until the edges look dry and the cookies are fragrant

head: nutella cookies
tail: allow them to cool briefly on the baking sheet before transferring to a wire rack
